law.catch_line: Plants to be licensed -- License fees -- Expiration and renewal of licenses -- Licenses nontransferable.

text.section: Each frozen food locker plant or branch frozen food locker plant operated in this state shall be licensed under and subject to the provisions of KRS 221.010 to 221.100.

There shall be paid to the secretary with each application for a refrigerated locker license or for renewal of such license an annual license fee of ten dollars ($10) and the funds therefrom shall be disbursed by the secretary for the enforcement of KRS 221.010 to 221.100.

Each such license shall expire on December 31 following its date of issue, unless sooner revoked for cause. Renewal may be obtained annually by surrendering to the secretary the old license certificate and paying the required annual license fee. Such license fee shall not be transferable to any person nor be applicable to any location other than that for which originally issued.

law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(21). -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 134, sec. 2. -- Created 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 200, sec. 3.
